Feb. 27, 1954 D Wessex Brass Band Association (Third Section)

Test Piece Contest
The Chieftain [Greenwood]
Central Hall, Southampton, Hampshire, England, UK March contest: Set piece: 'The Thin Red Line' 1 Salisbury City, 40 pts, draw 1 2 Portland Town, 37 pts, draw 3 Gillingham, draw 5 Handley, draw 4 Southampton BL, draw 2
Best Trombone: Portland Best Euphonium: Portland
5 bands competed
